page.title: 17A Day in the life of Matthew
page.content: A typical Sunday for me would be to wake at 8.00 am and go down for a breakfast of Sugar Puffs. After breakfast I dress in casual clothes and help my mother to clear away the breakfast things. Then my younger brother and I go out for a bicycle ride while my father works in the garden. On returning from our ride my younger brother has a friend round to play and I help Daddy garden until lunch is ready. A typical Sunday lunch for our family includes roast lamb, roast potatoes, peas, carrots, cabbage, gravy and mint sauce. For dessert we have apple pie and custard. After lunch my brother and I play with construction Lego until bath time. Following our bath we have tea and then get ready for bed. We watch television for a while and I read before going to bed.
